lead_paragraph: The movie box office for 2009 reached $10.6 billion, up about 10.1 percent from $9.63 billion in domestic ticket sales in 2008.
snippet: The movie box office for 2009 reached $10.6 billion, up about 10.1 percent from $9.63 billion in domestic ticket sales in 2008.

byline.original: By MICHAEL  CIEPLY; Compiled by JULIE BLOOM
